messages.subject: Hello all
messages.msgSnippet: Tragedy has struck me hard this week. The worst is that my computer got infected on Monday or Tuesday with the Trojan Horse Virus and now my computer has to be
messages.messageBody:
Tragedy has struck me hard this week. The worst is that my computer
got infected on Monday or Tuesday with the Trojan Horse Virus and now
my computer has to be made-over to fix it. So I won't be able to post
for a while and am using my sister's computer to just do this
notification. I promise to let everyone know when it's back up and
running again.
